declarationSection.title: Confirm details and send your registration details

fields.label: authorisedText
fields.infoText: You must be authorised to act on behalf of the company to submit this registration. For example, a director or a company secretary (if you have one).

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm the application has been submitted

fields.infoText: By submitting this application, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.

You can avoid a financial penalty by applying for registration at the correct time. 

You have the right to appeal if we impose such a penalty.

HMRC will send you a letter to confirm your registration details and return date so you can prepare to submit your first Bingo Duty return.

You must contact your local authority to get a license to promote bingo events on all of your premises, even if you have started trading.
